p: Psidium guineense leaf oil from Mato Grosso do Sul, Brazil, dominated by spathulenol (80.1%) showed the inhibition of 59.46% in a carrageenan-induced mouse paw model, at 300 mg/kg, reduction of 45.33% (at 30 mg/kg) and 77.70% (at 100 mg/kg) in the increase of total leukocytes in pleurisy model, and reduction in the rise of protein levels of 49.72% (at 30 mg/kg) and 78.40% (at 100 mg/kg) [ 84].
